sense.def:
Kadar dve ali več stvari
combine
ali kadar človek
combines them
, obstajajo skupaj ali pa jih tisti človek združi.

seg.quote: We would all prefer to combine liberty with order.
Later the two teams were combined.
The combined efforts of police and military were at last successful.

sense.def:
A combine
je skupina ljudi ali organizacij, ki delajo skupaj.

Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
combines two qualities or features
, ima obe omenjeni lastnosti ali značilnosti.

seg.quote: Carbon fibre combines flexibility with immense strength.
Morality and national pride combine in his public statements.
...a perfect example of professional expertise combined with personal charm.
His eyes were wide with amazement and adoration combined.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
combines two activities
, hkrati opravlja dve dejavnosti.

seg.quote: It's difficult to combine family life with a career.
One person combines the work of both District Nurse and Health Visitor.
